lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in health psychology at UC Irvine in southern California. I study stress, how stress impacts disease.

lender.name: katy
lender.loan_because: I know that even a small amount of money can make a huge difference in someone\'s life. I have been blessed with tremendous opportunity and feel it is both a pleasure and an obligation to share in a way that might give someone else the opportunity to better their life.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. We cannot count on governments: we must count on one another to make life easier on those who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of people trying to show not only what they look like, but who they are.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love.
lender.occupational_info: Iâ€™m a dog. I like to herd things. My mission in life is to protect the world from evil squirrels. My favorite food is kitty-roca. Other than that I like to hoard attention and snuggle as much as possible.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe that small gestures sometimes produce big results.

lender.name: Jani-and-Price
lender.occupational_info: Jani teaches Spanish to American students who are 14-17 years old. Price teaches French to the same age.

lender.name: Marcie
lender.loan_because: I would like to be unselfish. I feel good knowing I\'m helping someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I lease apartment homes. The apartments are very nice and are in a nice area near Salt Lake City- the capitol of Utah. I get to meet alot of people. I help others to feel comfortable in their new home by answering their questions about the surrounding community. I like my job and am thankful for the opportunity to work here.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that women all over the world should empower each other to succeed. If we can each help just one other person to pull themselves out of poverty and educate their children with hard work and not handouts, then there is hope for the future of our planet to live as one.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small motel in the mountains of northern Montana. I was a soldier, I am a woman, and I try everyday to try and become a better person.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: i used to live and work in Africa as a journalist and believe that there is a huge amount of entrepreneurial spirit there.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: I feel it's very important to support and encourage others to become self sufficient and build self confidence and pride within their families and communties.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to adult learners. They are primarily from Mexico. We have two free classes a week, where we learn skills to use in the community.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives, educate their children, and strengthen their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing to young adults at a university. I feel so lucky that I am able to share my talents, and I love helping students to learn such a vital skill.

lender.name: Kelv
lender.loan_because: I so love seeing people blessed by the little I have to give. It literally changes lives!
lender.occupational_info: I write songs to help communicate to people how awesome God is and to help them respond to God with worship, in every circumstance of life.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I feel I have been blessed with a good life. I hope I can pass on some of my blessings to someone else
lender.occupational_info: I analyze medical expenses and project future medical costs. I provide consulting services to business wanting to project future benefit costs.

lender.name: Xheni
lender.loan_because: I believe in redistributive justice.\r\n

lender.name: Taliesin
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without and though I don\'t have much, I want to give what I can so fewer people have to go through that experience.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my free time studying...for work I copyedit other people\'s writing, which is basically finding mistakes and fixing them.

lender.name: Selah
lender.loan_because: I like small businesses. I like foreign countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve how organizations store their data on computers. I try to make it simpler, more organized and easier to use.

lender.name: kristel
lender.loan_because: These loans are gifts on behalf of all the people I am blessed to have here in my life that support me in so many ways. -paz-
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe in global capitalism

lender.name: Monnica
lender.loan_because: it's the recycling of good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: simultaneously consuming and fulfilling.

lender.name: JOE
lender.loan_because: I HAVE MY OWN BUSINESS AND KNOW HOW DIFFICULT IT IS TO FIND CAPITAL TO GET STARTED.
lender.occupational_info: I HAVE A MOBILE SERVICE THAT HELPS DISABLED PERSONS WITH REPAIRS ON THEIR SCOOTERS, POWER WHEEL CHAIRS, LIFT CHAIRS AND OTHER HANDICAP NEEDS.

lender.name: ardeshir
lender.loan_because: Every one has to get a chance
lender.occupational_info: tedious

lender.name: In Memory of Eric So
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, but am disillusioned with ordinary charity and taxes.rnrnI once read that while we may earn our money in the immediate sense, the circumstances that we were born into and are privileged to enjoy also 'earn' that money for us. I can imagine few things in my life that I could have 'earned' with hard work if I lived in a village where, as Achewood put it, the economy is based on my brother riding a bicycle with no tires past a broken crate.rnrnI hope that all my actions create good in the world, and lessen the bad. I am trying to focus my life through that lens.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to share my material abundance with others who may not have as much.
lender.occupational_info: I sell furniture to people at a store in the United States.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is the future of poverty alleviation.

lender.name: Alaska Cares
lender.loan_because: The world needs individuals to group together for the sake of the common good.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Alaskans including faculty and students of the Rural Development program at the University of Alaska in Fairbanks, students of other programs, and working Alaskans who believe that we can help make this world a better place.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help create a world community where the boundries between countries will not matter.

lender.name: Dawn and Craig
lender.loan_because: we look in to our childrens eyes, they teach us to give.

lender.name: Paul & Beth
lender.loan_because: How can we not when we have so much by comparison?

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I loan through KIVA because my faith calls me to act in ways that will create a more just, equitable, and peaceful world. KIVA loans empower others around the world to create better lives for themselves, their families, and their communities.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government to try and make people\'s lives safer and better.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it\'s relatively easy to raise money in the U.S. to start or expand a business. I know that is not the case in many parts of the world. Many people can only dream of owning their own business and controlling their economic destiny. Let\'s make a difference to these people and share some of what we have.
lender.occupational_info: While I build houses for a living, I also have gotten a great deal of pleasure from being involved in starting companies with business associates, friends, and loved ones. Nothing can compare to the feeling of accomplishment and pride I see in the faces of people when they take a struggling young business and put their heart and soul into making it successful. That\'s the beauty of capitalism and freedom.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Brian and Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I believe self-sustainability benefits a community as much as the individual. I want to help others

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe that supporting small business owners will improve economies and quality of life. I hope that those that receive these loans will be successful and become able to extend similar assistance to others in their community and pass it on.

lender.name: Patrushka
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that my money will really have a long-term effect on people who need a helping hand to get going. I\'m excited to be part of their business ventures!

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I see this as a wonderful opportunity to help others make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: In my work I support the doctors and nurses of a large not for profit healthcare system who provide the highest quality care and treatment to people in my community.

lender.name: Ky&Tine
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because:
I loan because this provides a perfect opportunity for performing acts that increase the social welfare, while remaining economically viable.
I had a professor in college remake the old adage: "Give a man a fish, and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and feed him for a lifetime. Teach a man to start a fishery, and feed a whole village."
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that does large social science research. My role is to help manage the data.

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: I work for a huge bank that seems to only lend money to people who are already rich. Now I\'m the banker (on a tiny scale) helping people who aren\'t rich - yet!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, making travel arrangements, setting up meetings, and handling administrative projects for the head of a division of a bank.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it helps folks, it allows a tangible connection, and i know that the money gets to the people that need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping to set up and monitor HIV treatment clinics primarily in sub-Saharan Africa.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I like being able to lend person-to-person. KIVA gives me the information to make a good loan.

lender.name: Jason Leslie Rogers
lender.occupation: Husband and Father, Photographer and Writer
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do it for me.
lender.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time at home taking care of my daughter and our house for my wife and me. I am also a freelance photographer and writer.

lender.name: Doug Dosdall
lender.loan_because: I deeply care about economic development in the developing world and have seen first hand how access to small amounts of capital can change someone\'s life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites and web-based businesses. I am currently specializing in vacation rental websites and hotels and am just starting a project to provide a market for coffee farmers in Oaxaca to sell a value added goods direct to consumers.

lender.name: Matteo Spreafico
lender.loan_because: Quando l'ultimo albero sarÃ tagliato, l'ultimo fiume inquinato, l'ultimo pesce pescato, scoprirete che il denaro non si puÃ² mangiare.

lender.name: Corrie&Myles
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: keith and cat
lender.loan_because: We think it can make a difference, that initiative should be encouraged, that too many of us have it way too good and that we don\'t get involved enough.
lender.occupational_info: Cat teaches English at a university and Keith teaches to advertising professionals and manages other English teachers

lender.name: isabella
lender.loan_because: i prefere to help people in giving them an opportunity to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: i work in the emergency room of a big hospital in the center of rome

lender.name: Colton
lender.loan_because: I am more fortunate than many.
lender.occupational_info: I manage various computer system projects for Wells Fargo Bank\'s Business Internet division.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I've been hungry.
lender.occupational_info: I study plant communites and work to preserve natural areas.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and want to share the blessings I have been given.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to contribute to someone else's quality of life - in whichever way they choose.
lender.occupational_info: I consult on ways to unleash entrepreneurship and its contribution to human development

lender.name: Christy-CityGirls Group
lender.loan_because: A pilgrimage, after all, is a strenuous undertaking, one in which companionship and support may be pivotal. - Julia Cameron

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: capitalism works--- individual initiative trumps government-run projects. It's all based on people's incentives.
lender.occupational_info: I develop ways to increase profitability

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: People helping people grow is one of humanity's greatest calllings..
lender.occupational_info: I oversee an accounting group that keeps the financial records for a company.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I can. The only reason I can is because I have received so much support from my friends and family throughout my life. This is my chance to extend that grace to others, whose only deficiency in the pursuit of their goals is capital.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel employees about the benefits to which they are entitled, such as health insurance, life insurance, and help them when they are ready to retire.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: It is important to help change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a geek

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I would like for others to have at least a small part of the opportunity I have had.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Programmer

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with refugees.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: This can really make a difference to a person\'s life, for such a small amount (to us). There really seems to be no downside.
lender.occupational_info: I set up health plans for employers. This allows them to give their employees life insurance, health and dental care.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: What more sensible way to help those who are really trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Worked with handicapped people until retirement.

lender.name: parisa
lender.loan_because: I believe I have a responsibility towards my fellow human beings. We are all citizens of the world. All that is here belongs to all of us. I happen to be more fortunate to be able to study and work but I never forget about those who haven't been as fortunate as me. I feel I am responsible for what happens to them. I cannot just shot my eyes or close my ears.... This is my responsibility as a human being... Thank you KIVA to make it easy and possible for us!

lender.name: Carla
lender.occupational_info: Global Jewelry at Your Fingertips.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Development in SouthWest US

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand now and again, and this is an easy way to offer that hand to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small organization that connects the global food community by creating networks locally and building opportunities for global food tourism.

lender.name: Irish Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help those striving to succeed and live in peace.
lender.occupational_info: We do our best to live in integrity and harmony with the world.

lender.name: staceyjoy
lender.loan_because: I'm thrilled that I can provide some support to women around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a knitwear designer, and own a small boutique in Brooklyn, NY, US.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is the smallest gifts in life that make big differences.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I have been in need of a helping hand in the past and am grateful to all those that helped me. It seems to be the least I could do to help others make their dreams come to fruition.
lender.occupational_info: I use geographic computer technology to map the world in which we live. I also analyze the impact of humans on the earth .

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward."

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I believe that in lending theres power, and helping others is like helping your self succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: As something that everyone who has the mean should do, a little grain of rise that shift the balance!!!

lender.name: Ralph W
lender.loan_because: Money makes the world to around
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer. I interpret and apply the law to facts created by other people.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Money is relative in value. I\'m not rich by American standards but what little I have can go a long way in other parts of the world. I want to help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician at heart but I make money as a carpenter. I fix things in homes before they go on the market to be sold.

lender.name: Ava, Susie & Shahram
lender.loan_because: This is the greate place to help others help themselves overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer applications to facilitate business processes.

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: God works through us.

lender.name: Kiera
lender.loan_because: I wanted to realize my dream of becoming a professional musician, but I needed help. Thanks to the amazing financial/spiritual/emotional support given to me by others, I am now living my dream. Now it\'s my turn to help others realize their dreams, and I can\'t wait!
lender.occupational_info: I am a classical singer, better known as an \"opera singer\". Every day I have the privilege of performing incredible music by the great composers of the past, as well as helping living composers bring their compositions to life for the first time.

lender.name: Mike/Matthew
lender.loan_because: We respect the efforts of others trying to better thier lives and the lives of people in their communities in areas with fewer opportunities. We enjoy traveling the world engaging in diffrent cultures and would like to support their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Device sales management/5th grader

lender.name: Bellamy-Allen Families
lender.loan_because: It makes a great holiday gift for loved ones while helping others around the world

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help others grow their businesses and improve their lives.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a University Student at the University of Victoria in Victoria,British Columbia. I am studying my Bachelor of Education, for I hope to be a Elementary Teacher when I am finished. I would love to travel and teach internationally as well, in the future.

lender.name: Sarah and John
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ingenuity of others.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah works as a book editor. John is a graduate student in engineering, working to create a renewable source of fuel.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: Microloans are such an effective way to help small entrepreneurs establish and improve their businesses. It is a direct way that I can impact low-income individuals who have a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Helping authors refine manuscripts to publishable condition.Advocacy for education for English-language learners, low-income children. To educate other Americans about the rest of the nonEuropean world.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: the entrepreneurial spirit lives in all of us!
lender.occupational_info: My interest is in how institutions and policy foster entrepreneurial activity around the world.

lender.name: GoodWire.org
lender.loan_because: You visit GoodWire.org to read positve news stories and interesting, upbeat articles. Socially and environmentally-conscious advertisers pay to advertise on GoodWire.org. 80% of advertising revenues are given to Kiva.org
lender.occupational_info: I love what I do. What could be better than a job that affects people\'s lives in a postive way? It\'s a truly win-win situation for everyone. Thanks for helping!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe there is goodness in this world, and it is worth fighting for it.

lender.name: Jim & Leise`
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Joyously helping families take dream vacations to learn about themselves and other peoples.

lender.name: Frenzy
lender.loan_because: Because its the right thing to do, I support people that take control of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I add machines and controls to factories

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in life with a good career, good health and a loving family. This is my way to give back, and give others a helping hand.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office in New York City\'s Times Square. It's very busy!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out to women around the globe who are furthering their economic goals for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children to experience the world of Art by learning about famous artists and creating their own masterpieces. We explore various Art forms from many different lands and cultures world-wide.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: this can make a real difference in real people's lives. I want to help people who want to help themselves. I appreciate how personal this process is. Thank you, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: My whole life I have helped people with mental illnesses. Now I help design and run programs for people with these crippling disabilities for a county government in California.

lender.name: Jim Barton
lender.loan_because: I think there's no better way to make a difference in the world than micro loans.
lender.occupational_info: Director and writer for commercials, web productions and corporate communications.

lender.name: Sumit Chachra
lender.loan_because: I think small amounts of money I lend can make a big difference in someones life!

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: why not support good initiatives?

lender.name: silvia
lender.loan_because: Because the sea is made of billions of tiny little drops.

lender.name: MikeH
lender.loan_because: this is the best way to help those in need in the third world.

lender.name: Chiara
lender.loan_because: I like it.

lender.name: Gianni
lender.loan_because: I believe in loyalty, confidence and collaboration
lender.occupational_info: manager

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: i care.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in grassroots.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids that we're all responsible for our world and the people in it. It's such a reward to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Raising kids is great work if you can get it.

lender.name: Larry Gay
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help individuals, especially women to better their economic conditions. We need to help others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate professor of education and I teach teachers and administrators about leadership.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: Jen is a Geography professor. Her interests are urban poverty in the United States and Ghana.

lender.name: jen
lender.loan_because: i admire people who have the initiative and dedication it takes to be an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: i help the united states government enforce our laws protecting american workers.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: My mommy says so.
lender.occupational_info: My mom said that before I was born she had her own business making wedding cakes and desserts for restaurants. She told me that this type of work is challenging and rewarding & she wants to help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Sachyn
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help those less fortunate and one person can make a difference. Its fantastic to be able to see and help the people who are taking the chance to turn their lives around rather to have my money sent to a faceless charity.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: teacher of English as a Second Language

lender.name: Brian and Jeannie
lender.loan_because: We want to share our blessings with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Brian is a programmer. I am a student.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I can, and I admire entrepreneurs and have faith in their ability to change the world.

lender.name: A Cellar Full of Noise
lender.loan_because: We support KIVA to help other agricultural producers and entrepreneurs to develop their resources and skills in the hopes that they will be as fortunate as we are in making a living working with our land.
lender.occupational_info: We are grape growers and wine producers in California's Central Coast.

lender.name: Kiera
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Bohica
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the best way to create positive change and make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Luz
lender.occupation: freelance writer, former reporter and mother

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with an amazing family and it is away for me to share with others. I believe we all share in the responsibilty of pulling another person up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with homeless and low income families to find safe, clean, and affordable housing.

lender.name: doug
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't we?

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It makes good financial/ethical sense to let the money work and help others rather than sit in a savings account.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist that uses computers to make art and animations for video games.

lender.name: karin
lender.occupational_info: teaching college students with learning difficulties.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I need Karma credits (and my wife wouldn\'t leave me alone)

lender.name: connie
lender.loan_because: I respect honest hard work. We should all be given an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My work is my pleasure. I feel good about having produced results at the end of the day.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe that the way to make the world a better place is to help each other. Lending money to these hardworking folks is one way I can contribute to and promote this spirit of kindness.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I'm helping others to improve thier lifes.
lender.occupational_info: I reconcile Bank accounts daily and monthly for a large Life Insurance company.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: My Company is a web site that lets people turn music they own into their own custom ringtones for their mobile phones.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It\'s better to give than receive! I am excited to help people grow their small business.
lender.occupational_info: I manage sales people. Our company sells software and computers.

lender.name: Jonelle
lender.loan_because: I respect all of humankind\'s right to create the life God intended for them and I truly believe we are all in this world together for a reason. It takes a village.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for taking care of the basic needs of the people who are hired to work for my company. This allows our employees to concentrate on the job our company hired them to do. I help in providing medical benefits, paychecks, career development and hiring of new employees.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Every human being is precious. What are we here for if not to encourage each other through life\'s journey? As a follower of Jesus, I long to be gracious toward others, just as God has been so gracious toward me.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university assisting college students with disabilities who need services in order to have equal access to their education (for example: sign language interpreters in class so deaf students can participate in class lectures; audio books so those who are blind can \"read\" their text books, etc).

lender.name: Ryan and Colleen
lender.loan_because: People deserve the chance to pursue their personal dreams. We are blessed with the resources to help these dreams become reality.

lender.name: John Boddie
lender.loan_because: Lending is slightly addictive. It feels like the world's slowest video game. That appeals to me.
lender.occupational_info: I write project-related articles for a major international donor agency. Most of these articles are based on interviews with villagers in rural Afghanistan. Prior to this, I spent 2 years in India & 2 years in Singapore working with small companies, some of which were similar to Kiva Portfolio companies

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I finished an MA in Math Education and I have a BS in Computer Science. I am looking for work in technology/math education.

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have my dream job as a teacher. Now, I want to help people make their dreams of becoming an entrepreneur come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher. I have the most rewarding job I can think of. Being able to teach children and watch them grow and mature into smart young adults is the best feeling in the world.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: ..of a generous boss.

lender.name: erin
lender.loan_because: Most Americans, however we may complain, are richer than we know, and I think most of us take it for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I help people of different ages and abilities learn the skills to travel through their lives independently, happily, and hopefully, peacefully.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Purchasing agent

lender.name: TheWorrellGodParents
lender.loan_because: We want to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are just regular families that like to help others.

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to have all that I have

lender.name: California Kids
lender.loan_because: it is a great example for us to set for our children.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of parents and kids that got together for playtime 12 years ago. Our oldest children are almost in college. Community service is important to us all.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Small steps can make a difference towards a big change.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people how to take care of their money in order to try to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Mary LeBus
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people, & that makes me feel good about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I play music & teach harp & piano & have fun \"Jamming\" with my friends.

lender.name: NativeTexan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others succeed in bettering their lives & I believe they will in turn (& consequentially) improve the lives around them. The best most rewarding investment is investing in the lives of others. Christ/God blesses me financially so I want to share my blessings from Him with others. I bless these loans and their recipients with prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I do electronic/electrical controls related work for semiconductor & other industrial customers, and municipalities.\r\n

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others. Helping goes in cycles. I want to help others while I can, because someday I may need help myself. Also, I really admire those who have a vision and gameplan for achieving their goals.

lender.name: Wulan
lender.loan_because: I believe in lending the hook than giving the fish :)

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: small things make a difference
lender.occupational_info: electronics

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: because my beautiful grandchildren deserve a kinder, more caring world. For me, the way to accomplish this is through helping people succeed and become independent. It is my dream that those that are helped will help others.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals in a more personal way than donating to large charitable organizations. I want to know I've made a difference in a person's life. I believe in providing a sustainable income.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently teaching English to a Korean businessman who has moved his family to the Denver, CO, area to start the USA office of his company in Korea.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have and want to share. My Nana & Pappers are teaching me about people and places around the world. Someday I will go to these places and meet my Kiva friends.

lender.name: Cara and Rick
lender.loan_because: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints( The Mormons), I believe in helping my Brother, no matter where he is.
lender.occupational_info: Boring, but necessary. We have spent more time developing land, than in our actual vocation. We own Apache Fort Investigations. 480-200-6266

lender.name: teresa and rick
lender.loan_because: It's the best way we know to do a little bit to redistribute wealth in the world. We were involved in another small loans fund for 4 years in the late 90s. We loaned out the total fund of $7000 over and over in small loans in a slum in Morocco. We got the whole sum back after 4 years when private small loans funds were outlawed by the Moroccan government.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time as a reading teacher, translator, and copy-editor. I translate French to English and copy-edit also for Kiva. Rick earns the big bucks that pay for the loans.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe in global economic justice - and working to achieve that politically and redistributing income now through efforts like Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: My organization - Texas Campaign for the Environment - works to organize Texans to improve our health and environment through door-to-door organizing, action that will get the attention of the public and through legislation. We are working to have computer, TV and electronics companies take back old equipment for safe recycling.

lender.name: Marcia & Mark
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and we wanted to think bigger than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Marcia is a teacher and Mark is a hospital administrator.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: i believe it will help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: ... i listen to my teacher say things and teach us. My favorite subject is social studies.

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: I loan to try to make the world a better place. I believe individuals who 'have' must help those who have little. US Kiva members help to counteract our country's abysmal foreign policy and economic positions.

lender.name: ina
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I have the chance of help.
lender.occupational_info: Currently looking for a job in Marketing field.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Drew McIntosh
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sky
lender.loan_because: "there but for the grace of god go I" By chance I was born, live and work in a country of excess- so i spread it around!
lender.occupational_info: i deal poker. presently, I don't work for any one casino. I deal major tournaments in the u.s. and Europe. Most of my poker income is derived from tokes (tips). I also work part-time in a retail woman's clothing store.

lender.name: USCMeche
lender.loan_because: I hope that each loan helps a person in poverty, and that these people can be an inspiriation to the friends and family around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineering student looking to pursue a legal education after graduation to develop a non-profit focused on work projects within the US and abroad.

lender.name: Greg & Sylvia
lender.loan_because: It is important to share the bounty that we have received by mearly being born in Canada. And, it is important to assist those who have the initiative to take responsibility for their future. Everyone benefits.
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired from our previous work which was for Greg a community planner and Sylvia an airline flight attendant.

lender.name: Asia and Rueben
lender.loan_because: it's important
lender.occupational_info: math + music = fun

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It follows the maxim of "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, Teach a man to fish and he eats for life."
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers (software and hardware).

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help women
lender.occupational_info: I work in a college library helping young people find books and information for their studies

lender.name: Huy
lender.loan_because: it's a fantastic idea

lender.name: Buttercup
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in Jesus' name, The Son of The One True God. The Word of God instructs us as Christians to love our neighbors as ourselves. Because the Lord loved me before I knew Him and blesses my life I pray to love someone else I do not know and hopefully bless their life so that they might know that the Lord loves them too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Homemaker and Home educator. I am married with three children, 2 sons, and 1 daughter. .

lender.name: Mike and Mim
lender.loan_because: We believe that we are all one and that what we do, or do not do, has an impact on everyone. We want to have a positive impact on those less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: We live on a boat where we have our computer-based business which is web and print design, mostly for small businesses.

lender.name: Trooper
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given. In His name we are to share. God Bless Us Every One.
lender.occupational_info: Video Engineer

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others to improve their lives and the lives of others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies become more profitable and achieve more of their goals.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: My husband was sweet enough to give me and someone else a wonderful gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a 60 year old ceramic company that manufactures tableware and tile in Sausalito, California. I am in sales and marketing.

lender.name: Pippo
lender.loan_because: It\'s the better way to do something about te developping countries. What\'s more If I\'d sent my money to any huge internatioal organizations just a few of them will reach the people I\'d like to substain.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a pubblic organizations dealing with international cooperations. So I know almost all about that. That is why I\'ve decided to send my money trough Kiva organization......

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I analyse market dynamics and statistics. I am an economist in Los Angeles California, USA

lender.name: robyn
lender.occupational_info: I work for a science museum in San Francisco.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I grew up without a lot of money and now have a chance to help others.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help provide reproductive health services to women, men and teens.

lender.name: MJ and Liz
lender.occupation: Grad Student and Director of Nonprofit

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I wanted to do something meaningful and this was one way to accomplish that.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the program coordinator at a Team Challenge course.

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because: I think this a way to get a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm technician in a coal fired power station.

lender.name: Mattea
lender.loan_because: It doesn't matter if it's $25 or $250 it still makes a difference. :)

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: i heard about kiva and i thought it was a great idea, i hope it works!
lender.occupational_info: i design medical instruments which are used to diagnose disease

lender.name: Thia
lender.loan_because: We people of this planet are all connected. I am a single mother and fortunate to have a good job. I can support my three children and I wish that for all people.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It\'s a direct and immediate way to help people.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Its easy to help and you get to see constant progress

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: People need help especially because right now a lot of people on this earth are very hungry. Let's make sure they get fed.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: To make a difference in peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: Offering a global perspective to the resolution of conflicts.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: My children received a monetary gift from a stranger and my oldest felt it would be best to pass on our good fortune to someone less fortunate. I recommended KIVA and they all (eventually) agreed it was a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I support a computer network for a midsized company in America.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: to help others who are not as fortunate, and enable them to get ahead in life

lender.name: Apple
lender.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: This was actually a gift that I recieved at my company Chirstmas party. I\'m been very excited to become involved with Kiva ever since I saw a news segment about it. I can\'t wait to see how my loan will be used!
lender.occupational_info: I work with many companies to help them develop and produce accessories products.

lender.name: Marks Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is fortunate and we believe we should all help eachother a little bit... and that hard work pays off. So we and our children are happy to set aside some of our hard-earned money to help others do the same. Much of this money was earned/saved by our children to lend and share in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in software development managing teams that create new products and sell them globally. My wife is a teacher and a volunteer. My children go to school.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: it's good to help another person. This is what makes life worth living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Funky Monkey
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves inspires me. You always receive more than you can give. Kiva rocks, thanks for the opportunity to be a part of something that makes a real difference!

lender.name: Arjuna, Nadrae, Swe
lender.loan_because: we want to participate in social change
lender.occupational_info: we are both artists. our work itself focus on exposing human rights violations and helping those in need

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: As I believe in the principle of Sharing, I am trying to put it in practice. Comme je crois au principe du Partage, j\'essaie de le mettre en pratique.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in the public health field, but I am retired now. I am a member of a non profit organization that publicises the principle of Sharing. Visit it: www.share-international.org. Je travaillais dans le domaine de la santÃ© publique, mais je suis Ã ma retraite maintenant. Je fais partie d\'un organisme Ã but non lucratif qui oeuvre Ã rÃ©pandre le plus possible le principe du partage. Visitez-le : www.taraquebec.org

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I teach the science of drugs (pharmacology) to pharmacy students.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way I can make an impact on an individual.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician in training.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I write an online journal about the city in which I live, Fort Worth, Texas. It is called \"Cowtown\" because there is a long history of cattle raising in this area.

lender.name: William Zaffer
lender.loan_because: I feel that our country needs to show compassion and not violence around the world plus teach people to learn to have less children to stay out of poverty and the issue of global warming must be dealt with throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sell manufactured or mobile homes in retirement and family parks but my passion is teaching how to live environmentally and make the world a better place to live/

lender.name: Shanna
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage entrepreneurship and self-sufficiency. I believe that voluntary charity is the best form of aid.

lender.name: Kate McCullough
lender.loan_because: nobody should feel stuck and powerless by the circumstances he or she finds themselves in...they should have the opportunity to make their lives (and that of their families) better if they have the desire and courage to do so.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have been greatly blessed in my life, particularly in our abundant United States of America and I want to help others with a hand up to become self-sufficient with an abundant life of their own for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the travel business, creating computer systems that help facilitate people traveling anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea. I Kiva for selfish reasons....It feels good. Kiva Kiva is better than Kava Kava..... ;) "Giva" somebody a hand....Kiva.org
lender.occupational_info: I too am a small Business owner. I buy interesting things and then sell them in interesting places... Kiva.org has inspired me to do a lot more....big things to come!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love the spirit of an independent entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Brooke
lender.occupation: Kiva PR and Social Business Consultant
lender.loan_because: I became involved with Kiva simply by chance and I am so glad it happened! I now work with Kiva and 2 other socially minded organizations (ChangeFusion.org and AllDayBuffet.org) and feel that my time and energy is spent doing something I really care about.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for an organization called ChangeFusion that provides business support and incubation for start-up social businesses. These are businesses that focus on helping people and the planet while making a profit so they arent' dependent on donations.
I also have worked doing Customer Service and Public Relations for Kiva since 2006.
And I also work as a Social Business Developer for All Day Buffet.

lender.name: Roslyn
lender.loan_because: it's interesting

lender.name: Bob F.
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: one does what one can.
lender.occupational_info: librarian

lender.name: Paul and Carole
lender.loan_because: We are able to help other people achieve some of the things that are important to them.
lender.occupational_info: Carole teaches reading to children who have difficulty learning to read. They are between 5 and 10 years old. Paul\'s job is keeping computers current, safe, and available for the people who use them.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I have the means with which to help out others. I know how hard it is to start up your own business. Although the rewards are great, it is a stressful under taking and if I can help in a small way I am happy to. I have now decided that instead of giving my clients gift every year, I'm donating those monies to Kiva, and encouraging my clients to do the same.

lender.name: Karen and Dave
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Sex Turkey
lender.occupation: toungue shaver and spider monkey therapist
lender.loan_because: I hate america like all liberals do.
lender.occupational_info: Training seals to type novels and grooming emus

lender.name: Sage
lender.occupational_info: I am a storyteller.

lender.name: sinead
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help other people overcome poverty. I think this is a great opportunity to do so and it\'s great how it makes the world feel like a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m an aspiring teacher. I\'m going back to school next year to get my credentials & I hope to teach all around the world.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I think that microcredit is a real aid to poor nations.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: "If you can't feed one hundred people, then feed just one." - Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12-13 year old students how to write and communicate effectively.

lender.name: ruth
lender.occupation: food and info shop co-op member

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea to support small business worldwide. I like to help others who work to better their situation.

lender.name: Kristie & Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe that small business is the way out of poverty- which hopefully will lead to a better quality of life for all.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have seen how in developing areas of the world small amounts of money can do so much good. Microfinance loans help the recipients to work towards self sufficiency and a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a repair shop where I repair and maintain cars and trucks.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who are less fortunate than I am, this is due to my grandmother who was a very generous and extraordinary woman. Although we were very poor growing up in Jamaica she would help others if they were in need even though we didn't have very much. She was a and still is a great influence in my life and is responsible for the person I am today.
lender.occupational_info: As an Accountant I help clients maintain their books and records and to file their taxes and other information to the various government offices. I am the owner of a small accounting & taxation practice in Barrhaven (Nepean) Ottawa.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I understand the need for access to capital and want to give others a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I put together contracts for a company that moves oil drilling rigs.

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: i need to incress my Business its growing good
lender.occupational_info: reatal of bullding supply

lender.name: Tim & Sharon
lender.loan_because: \"it\'s a small world after all.\" How nice to know that our funds go directly to a faraway person who wants to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Tim and Sharon have been together since 1971, raising 2 kids with emphasis on travel and learning about the world. Tim works as a one-man logging contractor (Blue Ox Logging, Inc.), selectively cutting Indiana hardwood trees. Sharon is a high school librarian.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I loved travelling in Africa and want to do my part to help those poor over-worked women. PLus it gives me a reason to go back again!
lender.occupational_info: I source special gift items, silks & accessories from all the world for resale.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I CAN!!! Be the change you wish to see.......

lender.name: AnthroDiva
lender.loan_because: I believe that small steps can make a huge difference, and that people who were privileged to be born into the wealthy parts of the globe have an obligation to help those who did not win the same lottery!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, researcher, and writer. I try and use my teaching of anthropology to get American students to open their eyes and learn more about the planet they live on and the people they share it with.

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference...

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I see lending as a way to connect to the world beyond me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history to typical teenagers in the United States

lender.name: Philip, Ann and Emma
lender.loan_because: We loan because it's a simple way to help people, and besides...we can't think of any reasons not to!
lender.occupational_info: One is a music producer, one makes documentaries, and the third goes to school and takes photographs.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's amazing how much a little bit of money can do when it goes to the right person and place.
lender.occupational_info: I string words together in ways that help my clients make money, with a little left over for me.

lender.name: Gianluca
lender.loan_because: Partita finisce quando arbitro fischia

lender.name: Peter & Heather
lender.occupational_info: Peter works on Wind Turbines. Heather is a manager at a small bank.

lender.name: Cristiano
lender.loan_because: Teach a person how to fish and they will not go hungry again. I believe the best way to help others is to provide the tools for them to help themselves. Nothing is more exciting and rewarding than to run your own successful business. I know from experience. Thanks to Kiva, I can now have a greater impact in the continent where humanity originated, Afrika!
lender.occupational_info: The civil engineering profession spans many areas, including earthwork, infrastructure, and transportation. My expertise lies in soils engineering (also known as geotechnical engineering), which deals primarily with earthwork and foundations. Always remember, unless you are on water, you need soil on which to build something!

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: I like seeing others succeed
lender.occupational_info: I raised 4 girls and sent them successfully into the world

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to read, and think, and write about literature. I also teach about gay and lesbian literature, history, and culture.

lender.name: Micki and Tellie
lender.loan_because: I have a little and that seems to help others a lot.

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: Just something I can do to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a civil engineering company completing rainfall/runoff studies that go to protect communities from large-scale flooding events.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals in a way that fits their needs. It's important to me that I am able to see and know this person and understand what she wants her life to look like. I think it's more beneficial to let each person define what she needs than to give to a big charity with lists of rules and regulations. This way the money loaned is spent exactly the way it needs to be spent. Best of all, when the loan is re-payed I get to re-lend which means more happiness for me too.

lender.name: Tom & Kym
lender.loan_because: If we don't who will; besides it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kyle Moore
lender.loan_because: "Poverty does not belong in civilized human society. Its proper place is in a museum. That's where it will be." - Muhammad Yunus

lender.name: Marissa
lender.occupational_info: every day i go to school and do all of my required work.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference for someone else

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I would like to try to make a difference even if it\'s a small one.
lender.occupational_info: Full time student...I also sell vintage dresses on Ebay, mostly as a hobby.

lender.name: Nicolas Scheepers
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an organization that helps people make a difference in their communities, and because, coming from South Africa, I understand the effect poverty has on the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at UCLA interested in film production

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in Ecuador and other developing countries build and sustain their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist that paints and draws portraits.

lender.name: Christine & Mary Alice
lender.loan_because: We stopped buying Holiday gifts for each other and each year we add the money we would have spent to our loan fund. We loan because it helps us feel connected to people we live with in this world but would never get to meet.
lender.occupational_info: Christine is a nurse who helps people with developmental disabilites to have healthier and more independent lives. Mary Alice is a social worker who helps troubled families to do better and stay together. Christine's mother Raymonde is 93 years old and keeps up with world news and is a great cook.

lender.name: Scott & Laurie
lender.loan_because: To give other people the same opportunitiies that I had to get into business.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is, to my mind, one of the best ways of respecting the dignity of my fellow human beings, and promoting basic social and economic values.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs: I help students learn to read and think about philosophy, and I write fiction and non-fiction.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.occupational_info: house builder
